item.title: Open Data Day in The Hague 2023
item.description:
Reprex is a finalist for The Hague Innovators Award 2022, and the prize of the audience, in the startup category with our respectable competitors, Sib√∂, WECO, STHRIVE and ECOBLOQ.

Reprex will organize events on the International Open Data Day. Save the date in your calendar.

item.title: Reprex Nominated for The Hague Innovators Award
item.description:
Reprex is a finalist for The Hague Innovators Award 2022, and the prize of the audience, in the startup category with our respectable competitors, Sib√∂, WECO, STHRIVE and ECOBLOQ.

The transition towards a sustainable and inclusive economy depends on collaboration. That is why we are bringing together startups, scale-ups, investors, policymakers, and other impact makers from around the world in The Hague for the 7th edition of ImpactFest.

Please share our video message on YouTube among your colleagues and friends.

With the The Hague Innovators Challenge, the municipality of The Hague challenges startups, scale-ups, and students to present their innovative ideas for global issues, as described in the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

üíú We ask you, humbly, to support us with a vote or by sharing our appeal. We're part of the #opensource, #opendata, and #openscience movement that depends on your support to stay online and thriving, but many of our users or simply look the other wayü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èhttps://t.co/Qcdh7saPpW

— Competition Data Observatory (@CompDataObs) November 6, 2022

The nominees receive a substantive program aimed at further development and the growth of the plan or organization. At the end of the substantive program, all nominees submit a definitive action plan and this is pitched to a professional jury. The jury chooses one winner per category.
